text:
Users can now set styling specific to a form on a page, but is there a way to do that in HubL? Something like:

`{% module "form" path="@HubSpot/form" *style={[ "border" : { "color": "#ffffff" } ]}* %}`?

I'm creating some default drag-and-drop templates and some might have a form over a background colour, in which case I'd like to set the border colours to white on that page only. I couldn't find anything in the documentation.
